name: Assembly Required (itch) (TomWilkinson)
description:
Take on the role of a robot on an alien planet, sent there to gather crystals in the dangerous depths of the caves, return to your bunker to refuel and sell them to a local shady broker with an abundance of doublets for you. Be swift though as in 40 minutes a meteor will collide with the planet ending in total destruction. Repair your ship and get out with as many doublets as you can!

Assembly Required is a farming rogue-like sci-fi exploration game taking place on an alien planet where the player character must mine and grow crystals to enable them to escape the planet before destruction.

Game made as part of Staffordshire Universities collaborative project produced in a team of 17 students.
